channel.title: Iason Svoronos - Kanavas
channel.description: Recent content on Iason Svoronos - Kanavas

item.title: Personal Website
item.description: Bio Iason Svoronos-Kanavas is a Software Engineer in Audio @ JOYNEXT, and is set to be awarded a Master of Science by Research in Computer Science and Informatics from the Applied Psychoacoustics Lab (APL), School of Computing & Engineering, University of Huddersfield, UK, with only his thesis review pending. He has a background in sound technology (BSc, Ionian University, GR) and sonification, the process of mapping data onto non-speech sound for the purpose of enhancing perception and understanding.
